data.title: Taylor Dunn Personnel Carriers
data.meta-description: Find general information, specifications, manufacturer documentation, and special pricing on Used Taylor Dunn Personnel Carriers. Taylor Dunn Personnel Carriers are highly maneuverable, vehicles designed to carry your staff and their tools around your facility efficiently. Used Taylor Dunn Personnel Carriers are available at 50% off the price of new from American Surplus, buy quality used equipment and save!

attribute.name: Charging System
attribute.value: Built-in, 24V, 600 Watt, 25 Amp, 110 VAC, w/ Interlock

ul.li: 24V Series Wound Motor moves your team around the warehouse in moments instead of minutes
600 lb. Capacity supports your staff and their toolboxes
Welded steel frame & 16 gauge diamond plate body stands up to harsh environments

long-description.p:
The Taylor Dunn is designed to help your crew get around your facility efficiently. Featuring a quick and agile DC motor that offers top speeds of up to 10mph, your crew will never be too far from the next project. Despite their small profile, Taylor Dunn include room for up to two riders and a rear cargo deck. This allows your team to store the tools and parts they need to get the job done right the first time.
Used Taylor Dunn Personnel Carriers are now available at American Surplus at prices up to % off the price of new! Our inventory is always changing, so don't hesitate to call our office at (800) 876-3736 to speak to our sales team and get the latest updates on our inventory!
